page.title: 05ECOLOGY
page.content: ECOLOGY OFTEN FELLING TREES AT PEN YR GOUOR WOOD DURING 1985 5 ACRES WERE REPLANTED WITH OAK SAPLINGS . OAK , ALONG WITH OTHER VERIETIES WERE ALSO PLANTED ON THE 8 ACRES COED OER LE WOOD FIVE YEARS AGO . THIS WOOD IS NOW BECOMING ESTABLISHED AND HAS A GOOD UNDERGROWTH OF BRAKEN , BRIARS , ELDERS , BROOM WHICH PROVIDES EXCELLENT COVER FOR FOXES & PHEASANTS WHICH ARE NOW BREADING THERE . COMMON BUZZARDS CAN VERY OFTEN BE SEEN DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS HOVERING IN THE THERMALS , & HERONS , FROM THE HERONNY OF 24 NESTING PAIRS AT BRYN GWYN POOL , TRAVEL UP THE VALLEY AT CWM-NANT Y MEICHIAID VALLEY ALLONG THE BROGAN . IF THEY ARE ALL SEEN FLYING UP THE VALLEY , IT IS A SIGN OF GOOD WEATHER .
